hero.subtitle: Solid foundations for your most ambitious projects
hero.description: GNS BTP is your trusted partner to build solid and sustainable projects in Reunion Island. Whether it's building a home, developing a real estate program or carrying out a large-scale construction site, we ensure the structural work from A to Z. Thanks to our technical expertise and our knowledge of local constraints, we guarantee reliable, compliant and delivered with excellence.

values.title: OUR VALUES
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our excellence
values.description: GNS BTP places technical excellence at the heart of its achievements, with more than 25 years of experience and 150 homes delivered. Reliable and solid, we master the constraints specific to Reunion Island and guarantee compliant, sustainable and transparent construction sites. A trusted partner of public and private contractors, we build with seriousness and commitment to enhance the island's built heritage.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We are committed to delivering the highest quality work, adhering to the strictest industry standards.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Our team has recognized expertise in all aspects of structural work and construction.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to meeting deadlines and budgets while maintaining our standard of excellence.

expertise.title: OUR EXPERTISE
expertise.subtitle: Complete solutions for all your construction projects
expertise.description: Based in Reunion Island, we support public and private project owners with commitment and transparency.

testimonial1.quote: "Thanks to GNS BTP, our real estate project was carried out with exemplary precision and rigor. The deadlines were met and the quality of the construction is outstanding. A team that is both professional and attentive."
testimonial1.author: Sophie Martin

testimonial2.quote: "We collaborated with GNS BTP for the construction of an administrative building. Their technical expertise and transparency allowed us to move forward with complete confidence. They are a reliable partner that I recommend without hesitation."
testimonial2.author: Jean-Luc Robert

footer.description: GNS BTP offers tailored construction solutions that simplify and secure every stage of your projects, with a focus on solidity, durability, and architectural quality.
footer.tagline: GNS BTP is your trusted partner for all your construction and structural work projects.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.intro: GNS BTP is a Reunion Island company specializing in structural work, born from the meeting between an experienced site manager and seasoned real estate developers.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are?
whoWeAre.description: Together, they have united their expertise and vision to build a solid company, locally rooted and focused on excellence in construction. Each project we undertake embodies our values: reliability, rigor and commitment.

identity.title: Our identity
identity.description: The alliance between field technique and entrepreneurial vision is the strength of GNS BTP. With over 25 years of combined experience in development and site execution, we perfectly master the cyclonic, seismic and environmental standards specific to Reunion Island. We place quality and durability at the heart of each project.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: To support our individual clients, developers and communities in the realization of sustainable and efficient projects, while promoting local expertise. GNS BTP is committed to providing reliable, transparent and adapted solutions to each need, from residential projects to large-scale construction sites.

expertise.title: Our expertise
expertise.description: Our core business is structural work: foundations, structures, masonry and technical coordination. Thanks to rigorous organization and an experienced team, we guarantee solid, compliant and durable projects, even in the most demanding conditions of the island territory.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.description: To contribute sustainably to the real estate development of Reunion Island. To be recognized as a reference player in structural work, capable of combining performance, innovation and responsibility. We are building today the structures that will house tomorrow's Reunion Island.

strengths: Perfect mastery of local constraints (climate, soil, logistics)
25 years of combined experience in site management and real estate development

faq.question1: Are the prices displayed on the site final?
faq.answer1: No, the prices presented are indicative estimates based on typical projects. The final cost depends on the nature of the land, the materials chosen, the level of finish and the local constraints specific to each site.
faq.question2: How to get an accurate quote for my project?

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.description: We create sustainable projects, compliant with the most demanding standards of Reunion Island. Each site is a promise of rigor, quality and respect for commitments.

technical.title: Technical studies and design
technical.description: Plan analysis, sizing, and technical coordination before the construction site. Daily management of planning, quality control and team coordination.

difference.title: OUR DIFFERENCE
difference.description: What distinguishes GNS BTP is the alliance between the precision of a field professional and the vision of experienced entrepreneurs. 25 years of combined experience, 150 homes delivered, perfect mastery of the Reunion territory: we build with seriousness, deliver with excellence and contribute sustainably to the island's real estate development.

servicesData.description1: Complete execution of walls, foundations, floors, columns and slabs, with a methodical and precise approach according to current standards.
servicesData.description2: Recognized expertise in the implementation of reinforced concrete and the execution of complex, durable structures.
servicesData.description3: Our in-depth knowledge of the territory allows us to anticipate climatic, logistical and regulatory challenges specific to each project.
servicesData.description4: As a complement to the Rough Construction, we ensure the structural finishes necessary for the longevity and aesthetics of the structures.

hero.title: Our projects build trust
hero.description: Each site carried out by GNS BTP reflects our demand for quality and durability. From foundation to delivery, we build solid and aesthetic projects, adapted to the realities of Reunion Island.

realization.title: Résidence Les Flamboyants
realization.description: Construction of a set of 24 social housing units in Saint-Denis, combining modern comfort and compliance with cyclonic standards.

cta.tagline: Solid in execution, Transparent in commitment

news.description: Discover our news, advice and feedback on construction in Reunion Island. GNS BTP shares here its expertise, projects and vision of sustainable and controlled construction.

mainCard.title: Our projects build trust
mainCard.description: Each site carried out by GNS BTP reflects our demand for quality and durability. From foundation to delivery, we build solid and aesthetic projects, adapted to the realities of Reunion Island.

testimonials.description: Our teams support you at every step to transform your ideas into concrete projects

releases.description: Our teams support you at every step to transform your ideas into concrete projects
releases.title: Our press releases

pricing.intro: At GNS BTP, we believe that a well-estimated project is a well-launched construction site. Discover our service offers adapted to different types of constructions and get a clear and realistic estimate according to your needs.
pricing.title: PRICING & QUOTES

collective.title: Collective building
collective.description: Construction of residential or mixed buildings (housing + shops)

individual.title: Individual house
individual.description: Complete design and construction of an individual house with foundations, structures and structural work.

extension.title: Extension / elevation
extension.description: Expansion work, adding a floor or wing to an existing building.

notConvinced.title: Still not convinced? Try us!
notConvinced.description1: Don't worry, you're not signing anything right away.
notConvinced.description2: We guide you step by step to build a project that suits you.

faq.question1: Are the prices displayed on the website final?
faq.answer1: No, the prices shown are indicative estimates based on typical projects. The final cost depends on the nature of the land, materials chosen, finishing level, and local constraints specific to each construction site.
faq.question2: How can I get an accurate quote for my project?
faq.answer2: Contact us via our quote request form or by phone. We will organize a site visit to assess your project and provide you with a detailed quote tailored to your specific needs.
faq.question3: What are your typical project timelines?
faq.answer3: Project timelines vary depending on complexity and scale, but we provide detailed schedules during the consultation phase.
faq.answer4: Yes, we provide comprehensive after-sales service and warranty coverage for all our construction projects.
